goal.en: “Before the completion of this course each student should be able to: Understand basic principles of semiconductor materials and devices Understand the procedures of semiconductor processing Describe the fundamentals of semiconductor processing Understand the importance and applications of semiconductor processing in high-tech industry“
goal.ch: 本課程目標為介紹半導體材料與元件製程，此外並將簡介半導體材料與元件物理。除了引導同學對各項元件製程有初步的概念外、亦讓同學對其在產業界的應用有所瞭解。

content.en:
Semiconductor physics
Wafer fabrication
Thermal Processing
Ion implantation
Photolithography
Thin film deposition
Etching processing
content.ch:
微電子製程簡介
半導體基本物理
熱處理製程
微影製程
薄膜沉積蒸鍍與濺鍍
薄膜沉積
化學氣相沉積
擴散與離子佈植
濕蝕刻與乾蝕刻“

textbook.en: “Textbook: The Science and Engineering of Microelectronic Fabrication, S. A. Campbell (Oxford University Press) References: 1. Introduction to semiconductor manufacturing technology, Hong Xiao (Prentice Hall) 2. VLSI Technology, S. M. Sze (McGraw-Hill)“
